Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip on exterior, glazed streaky black (fired reddish); trace of two added white bands at bottom of sherd; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd joins British Museum 1888, 0601.381. See D. Bailey, 'Some Fresh Naukratis Joins', BSA 63 (1970) 3. The number 363 is written in pencil on the interior surface of the foot.
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 64, no. 759, pl. XXI, no. 759)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1128) (phase 2)
